articles.title: Tom Cruise surprises 'Mission: Impossible' fans at screening in Georgetown - Washington, DC - WUSA9
articles.description: Cruise was at the Georgetown AMC Theatre for a screening of Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
